name: profanity
description: Automatically ban users for using certain profanities.
author: voximity

badWords.description: A list of words that the user will be warned or temporarily banned for.

terribleWords.description: A list of words that the user will be permanently banned, instantly, without exception for.

terribleBanReason.description: The reason to use when a user is permanently banned for saying a terribly bad word.

warns.description: How many times to warn a user for using a bad word before they will be temporarily banned.

bans.description: How many times to ban a user for using a bad word before they will be permanently banned.

tempBanLength.description: The length of the user's temporary ban, in minutes.

tempBanReason.description: The reason to use when a user is temporarily banned for saying a bad word.

exemptRoles.description: A list of roles that are exempt from the profanity filter.
